name: Wood Splitting
description:
Wood Splitting

The first addition to a series of one button per player prototypes so look forward to more in the future!

One Player

Play against the computer snatch as many logs from under their keen blade as you can. 

Future updates will see a choice of difficulties, and an opponent that is more than just another axe competing for a log

Two Player

Compete with a friend to see who can chop the most wood in two minutes.

In the future we will have a co-operative mode in which two players will support each other against a mutual opponent

The Axes

Right now there is only one axe available to choose but expect more to come, each with their own strengths and weaknesses to accompany our default axe

The Logs Standard Logs

Gets chopped and moves on

Hardwood Logs

Can take more than one hit, mash that button to get as many chops in as you can

Infested Logs

Try not to hit these ones because they will lower your score

From Us

A big thank you from our entire team! Let us know about the state of the game or anything you'd like to see put in there in the comments section down at the bottom of the page.
